embeds.title: Jericho (Fiche)
embeds.description:
Résumé : Jericho
Cold-element DPS with all three weapons sharing the same elemental type. Dual Swords excels at Frozen Saber back-attack combos; Lance provides strong team barrier support while dealing damage; Rapier leverages guaranteed Crits on Chilled/Frozen targets with powerful Crit Chance scaling.

embeds.title: Overview
embeds.description: Cold-element DPS with all three weapons sharing the same elemental type. Dual Swords excels at Frozen Saber back-attack combos; Lance provides strong team barrier support while dealing damage; Rapier leverages guaranteed Crits on Chilled/Frozen targets with powerful Crit Chance scaling.
